spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct. However, doors for Bedroom 1 and 2 are rendered with curved planar artifacts rather than standard door swings. Window in Bedroom 2 is missing from the right-side wall.

structural_fidelity.notes: Garage detached status correctly interpreted. The 'Linen' closet at entry is incorrectly rendered as a protruding external structure. The 'L'dry' (Laundry) and 'WC' areas are merged or simplified into single wall cavities without proper enclosure.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinetry is simplified; the appliances (stove, fridge) are lumped into generic white blocks. Bathroom fixtures (toilet, vanity) are missing or represented by generic cubes.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric light and shadow work. Clean geometry with consistent wall thickness. Material choice is cohesive.

detected_errors.description: Missing window on the east-facing wall of Bedroom 2.
Orientation of the entry closet (Linen) is externalized rather than internal.
Rendering artifacts on internal doors appearing as curved solid planes.
Proportion distortion of the sink/laundry area; the L'dry nook is lacks the depth shown in plan.
